name: Flying Fortress (cshipway)
description:
Flying Fortress is a game created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

Instead of a traditionally nimble and light platforming character, you control a heavy, bulky mech that takes a long time to get to full speed, but is capable of impressive sprints and lofty leaps when you get there. Direct control over horizontal movement is replaced by a "gear" system that offers a choice/tradeoff between acceleration and max speed.

Created by Blake Hall and Connor Shipway.

Sound effects generated with Tom Vian's ChipTone.
https://sfbgames.com/chiptone/
